content: crochet a thick warm knit-look hat for men and boys with this super easy beanie pattern it comes in 8 sizes to fit just about everyone **pick up a convenient print-optimized pdf here or click through to the website via the visit pattern website link above this description to follow the pattern for no cost ** **skill ** easy **tools and materials list ** * 5mm hook or hook needed to obtain gauge * 60-150 yards #4 worsted weight wool yarn * scissors * yarn needle * ruler or measuring tape **additional supplies optional ** * leather tag **stitch glossary ** * chain = chain slip_stitch = slip_stitch * single_crochet = single_crochet center single_crochet * fpsc = front post crochet * bpsc = back post single_crochet * prev = previous * st/sts = stitch/stitches ad-free pdf includes a detailed stitch tutorial with images *see website for more information *
